data_block.py¶

exception modules.telemetry.data_block.DataBlockException¶

Base exception class for telemetry data block errors.

exception modules.telemetry.data_block.DataBlockUnknownException¶

Exception raised for unknown telemetry data block types.

class modules.telemetry.data_block.DataBlock(subtype: DataBlockSubtype, mission_time: int)¶

Interface for all telemetry data blocks.

__len__() → int¶

Returns the length of the datablock, not including the header.

abstract classmethod from_payload(payload: bytes) → DataBlock¶

Returns a DataBlock initialized from a payload of bytes. :param payload: The payload bytes representing the data block. :type payload: bytes

static parse(block_subtype: DataBlockSubtype, payload: bytes) → DataBlock¶

Unmarshal a bytes object to appropriate block class.

Parameters:

  • block_subtype (DataBlockSubtype.) – The subtype of the data block.

  • payload (bytes) – The payload bytes representing the data block/

Raises:

DataBlockUnknownException – If the block subtype is unknown.

abstract to_payload() → bytes¶

Marshal block to a bytes object.

class modules.telemetry.data_block.DebugMessageDataBlock(mission_time: int, debug_msg: str)¶

Telemetry data block for debug messages.

__iter__()¶

Iterate over the attributes f the debug message datablock.

__len__() → int¶
Returns:

the length of the debug message data block.

__str__()¶
Returns:

A string representation of the debug message data block.

classmethod from_payload(payload: bytes) → Self¶

Desearialize a bytes object to initialize a debug message data block.

Parameters:

payload (bytes) – The payload bytes representing the debug message data block.

to_payload() → bytes¶

Serialize the debug message data block to a bytes object

class modules.telemetry.data_block.StartupMessageDataBlock(mission_time: int, startup_msg: str)¶

Telemetry data block for startup messages.

__iter__()¶

Iterate over the attributes of the startup message data block.

__len__() → int¶
Returns:

The length of the startup message data block

__str__()¶

Return a string representation of the startup message data block.

classmethod from_payload(payload: bytes)¶

Deserialize a bytes object to initialize a startup message data block.

Parameters:

payload (bytes) – The payload bytes representing the startup message data block.

to_payload() → bytes¶

Serialize the startup message data block to a bytes object.
